[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: repay_with_account_cap()] [No Excess Check] repay_with_account_cap() returns entire balance without checking if excess exists - can caller misuse excess as free funds? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: entry_liquidation()] [Zero Address Update] entry_liquidation() updates rewards for @0x0 in incentive_v2 - does this properly update global indices without affecting any user's rewards? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: entry_liquidation()] [Liquidate User Update Order] entry_liquidation() updates liquidate_user rewards after updating @0x0 - can attacker liquidate before liquidate_user's pending rewards are realized, stealing unclaimed rewards? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: entry_liquidation()] [Bonus Balance Transfer] entry_liquidation() transfers bonus_balance to sender - if sender is contract that reverts on receive, does liquidation fail causing undercollateralized positions to persist? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: liquidation()] [Balance Return] liquidation() returns two balances - if caller doesn't properly handle both balances, can funds be locked in returned Balance objects? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: entry_liquidation()] [Excess Value Check] entry_liquidation() destroys excess_balance if value=0 - if balance::value() rounds down, can tiny amounts be destroyed incorrectly? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_claimable_rewards()] [Storage Mutation in Query] get_user_claimable_rewards() takes &mut Storage despite being query function - can concurrent queries race on storage mutation? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_claimable_rewards()] [Stale Data] get_user_claimable_rewards() calculates rewards using calculate_global_index() without actually updating state - can off-chain systems make decisions based on claimable amounts that differ from actual claim()? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_claimable_rewards()] [Key Construction] get_user_claimable_rewards() constructs keys by concatenating pool_key and reward_coin_type with comma - can collision occur if pool names contain commas? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_user_claimable_rewards()] [Rule ID Filtering] get_user_claimable_rewards() only adds rule_key to rule_ids if user_claimable_reward > 0 - can this cause rule_ids length mismatch with expected length, breaking off-chain parsers? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: parse_claimable_rewards()] [Vector Consumption] parse_claimable_rewards() consumes input vector with pop_back() - can caller accidentally lose ClaimableReward data by passing same vector to multiple parsers? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: delete_rule_for_testing()] [Improper Cleanup] delete_rule_for_testing() destroys tables with table::drop() - if tables contain entries, does drop() properly clean up or leak storage? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_mut_rule_for_testing()] [Test Exposure] get_mut_rule_for_testing() exposes get_mut_rule() in test mode - can test builds accidentally be deployed to mainnet exposing mutable rule access? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: update_index_for_testing()] [Zero Address Update] update_index_for_testing() calls update_reward_state_by_asset() with @0x0 - can test code leave invalid state if @0x0 has non-zero balances in test environment? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: create_rule()] [Enable State Default] New rules are created with enable=true by default - can attacker create rule right before admin configures rate, allowing users to claim zero rewards polluting state? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: set_reward_rate_by_rule_id()] [Update Race Condition] set_reward_rate_by_rule_id() updates state via update_reward_state_by_asset() then sets rate - can concurrent set_reward_rate calls cause race where second call uses stale data? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: calculate_global_index()] [Integer Division Loss] calculate_global_index() divides (rate * duration) by total_balance - can small total_balance cause integer division to round down excessively, losing significant reward precision? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: base_claim_reward_by_rule()] [Type Mismatch] base_claim_reward_by_rule() asserts rule.reward_coin_type matches but uses string comparison - can different type representations (e.g., with/without module prefix) bypass check? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: deposit_borrow_fee()] [TypeName Key Usage] deposit_borrow_fee() uses TypeName as Bag key - can TypeName collision between different generic instantiations cause fee corruption? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: entry_deposit_on_behalf_of_user()] [User Parameter Trust] entry_deposit_on_behalf_of_user() accepts arbitrary user address - can attacker deposit dust for many users to pollute their reward state and increase storage costs? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_core/sources/incentive_v3.move] [Function: get_effective_balance()] [Negative Balance Handling] get_effective_balance() computes effective balances by subtraction - if storage indices are corrupted causing supply < borrow for user, does subtraction underflow?
